review: I like horror movie. 1920 is scary at some parts and funny at some. It's a thumps up to all horror movie lover. You will like it. But I warn you it's not sheer scary as I said some parts may look funny or boring. But still it's a good piece to watch. The acting is commendable especially Adah's.
